pdaNetwork.client.network
Class WebClientPdaSocket

java.lang.Object
  pdaNetwork.client.network.ClientPdaSocket
      pdaNetwork.client.network.WebClientPdaSocket

public class WebClientPdaSocket
extends ClientPdaSocket

This class extends PdaSocket, it will create socket through a proxy using an HTML Tag.

Author:
PDA Server development team.

WebClientPdaSocket

public WebClientPdaSocket(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String service)
                   throws ProtocolException
Create a WebClientPdaSocket.

Parameters:
username - Name of the user of the service.
password - the password of the user.
service - Service called.
Throws:
ProtocolException - Throw an exception if username, password or service are null.

Returns:
